Press Release

NetBeans IDE 3.4.1 has been released in a complete community effort

23 Jan 2003

Prague, Czech Republic, January 23, 2003 - NetBeans today announced the release of NetBeans 3.4.1, the first non-Sun driven release of the NetBeans IDE - Merak. The culimination of more than two months of work from community members and Sun employees has resulted in the 3.4.1 effort.

Find more information on this release and to find out what has changed since NetBeans 3.4.

This stands to prove what community influence and efforts can provide.
